title: Corrections
description: Trait that applies a list of corrections to a document.

..\\story_elements\\correction.json.title: Correction
..\\story_elements\\correction.json.description: Describes a change that has been made to the document for transparency, or describes inaccuracies or falsehoods that remain in the document.

correction_type.description: Type of correction. E.g., clarification, retraction.

trait_id.json.title: Globally Unique ID trait
trait_id.json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.

trait_subtype.json.title: Subtype trait
trait_subtype.json.description: A more granular type than story, gallery, etc. (E.g., column, blog_post)

trait_channel.json.title: Channel trait
trait_channel.json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible

trait_alignment.json.title: Alignment
trait_alignment.json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.

trait_additional_properties.json.title: Has additional properties
trait_additional_properties.json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
